archimate:Device.name: Clinical Grade Monitor (CGM)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Clinical settings (Nursing stations, Emergency Room, Surgical, Medical Ward, Pediatrics, Maternity) • EMR viewing, patient monitoring dashboards, lab results, radiology image review (basic), and clinical documentation.
Specifications:
• Screen Size: 27 inches • Resolution: Full HD (1920x1080) or higher (QHD 2560x1440 recommended for detailed patient data visibility) • Panel Type: IPS with anti-glare coating. • DICOM Part 14 Compliance (For Basic Radiology Image Viewing) – Ensures grayscale accuracy. • Aspect Ratio: 16:9 • Refresh Rate: 60–75 Hz • Connectivity Options: HDMI, DisplayPort, USB-C, wireless screen sharing • Adjustability: Height, tilt, pivot, swivel adjustments (portrait/landscape rotation) • Eye Comfort Features: Blue-light filter, flicker-free technology • Protective Equipment: Antimicrobial screen protection film, medical-grade cleanable housing. IP Rated for Medical Use (IP32 or higher recommended) – Ensures resistance to disinfectants in clinical settings.
